theRepent:CausticAcid.NAME: Caustic Acid
theRepent:CausticAcid.DESCRIPTION: The target will take !M! hp damage from each excess therepent:acid not spent on damaging block, and increase therepent:acid decay to 2 per turn.

theRepent:QuickenDeath.NAME: Quicken Death
theRepent:QuickenDeath.DESCRIPTION: therepent:trigger all the following powers !M! times and then consume them: therepent:bleed, therepent:acid, poison, therepent:redemption. therepent:redemption is not consumed. Exhausts.

theRepent:SerratedEdge.NAME: Serrated Edge
theRepent:SerratedEdge.DESCRIPTION: Apply therepent:bleed equal to third of unblocked attack damage.
theRepent:SerratedEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply therepent:bleed equal to third of unblocked attack damage. innate.

theRepent:BloodDetonation.NAME: Blood Detonation
theRepent:BloodDetonation.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half therepent:bleed and consume that much therepent:bleed.

theRepent:NeedleStorm.NAME: Needle Storm
theRepent:NeedleStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 therepent:piercing damage !M! times to a random enemy. Exhausts.

theRepent:ArterialBleeding.NAME: Arterial Bleeding
theRepent:ArterialBleeding.DESCRIPTION: Change the therepent:bleed decay of a target to therepent:bleed growth for !M! turns. Exhausts.

theRepent:SaintsProtection.NAME: Saints Protection
theRepent:SaintsProtection.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your therepent:virtue to temporary hp. Exhausts.

theRepent:Repentance.NAME: Repentance
theRepent:Repentance.DESCRIPTION: Convert all therepent:sin on yourself to therepent:virtue.

theRepent:CarrySins.NAME: Carry Sins
theRepent:CarrySins.DESCRIPTION: Transfer all targets therepent:sin to you, and apply to it therepent:redemption equal to half the sin transferred (rounded up).
theRepent:CarrySins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transfer all targets therepent:sin to you, and apply to it therepent:redemption equal to half the sin transferred (rounded up). retain.

theRepent:DipVenom.NAME: Dip in Venom
theRepent:DipVenom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! therepent:envenom until the end of this turn.

theRepent:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
theRepent:Mercy.DESCRIPTION: Each time you heal another, gain half of the therepent:effective_heal amount (rounded down) as therepent:virtue.

theRepent:Trespass.NAME: Trespass
theRepent:Trespass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. When damage is blocked this turn, apply therepent:sin equal to damage blocked back to the attacker.

theRepent:WeepingShadows.NAME: Weeping Shadows
theRepent:WeepingShadows.DESCRIPTION: Each time you apply a debuff gain !M! block.

theRepent:Infect.NAME: Infect
theRepent:Infect.DESCRIPTION: Convert third (rounded up) of targets therepent:bleed to therepent:infection.

theRepent:Pinprick.NAME: Pinprick
theRepent:Pinprick.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 therepent:piercing damage and apply !M! therepent:bleed if target was poisoned and !theRepent:SecondMagic! poison if target was therepent:bleeding.

theRepent:DrawDarts.NAME: Draw Darts
theRepent:DrawDarts.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! dart cards to hand and draw one card.

theRepent:MedicalPoisoning.NAME: Medical Poisoning
theRepent:MedicalPoisoning.DESCRIPTION: Heal target for !M! hp and apply !theRepent:SecondMagic! poison to it.

theRepent:Lacerate.NAME: Lacerate
theRepent:Lacerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! therepent:bleed to target.
